snippet: The U.S. Embassy in Paris is asking a French auction house to suspend the planned sale Monday of Navajo and Hopi artifacts....

headline.print_headline: US Asks Auction House to Suspend Navajo, Hopi Sale
headline.main: US Asks Auction House to Suspend Navajo, Hopi Sale

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Embassy in Paris is asking a French auction house to suspend the planned sale Monday of Navajo and Hopi artifacts.
